Name: Notifying sidewalk construction permit applicants about scheduled tree planting.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notifying sidewalk construction permit applicants about scheduled tree planting.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Amended by Committee
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Hearing Scheduled by Mayor
History.MinutesNote: This bill was noticed but did not have a Mayoral public hearing on 12-18-2017

History.Description: This Introduction was City Charter Rule Adopted
History.MinutesNote: This bill was returned unsigned on Jan. 5, 2018 (31st Day, Dec. 31, 2017).

Summary: This bill would require the Department of Transportation to notify applicants for sidewalk construction permits to consult the website of the Department of Parks and Recreation for information on scheduled tree planting.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


     
     Section 1. Subchapter 1 of chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-159 to read as follows:
     � 19-159 Notification of tree planting when applying for sidewalk construction permits. The department shall notify applicants for sidewalk construction permits to consult the website of the department of parks and recreation for information on scheduled tree planting,. 
      �2. This local law takes effect on March 30, 2018, except that the commissioner shall take any measures necessary for the implementation of this local law before its effective date.
      
        
AV/MN
11/21/2017 12:26 PM
LS 4630/Session 9
